install_steps.step: Ensure Node.js 20 and jq are installed (on platforms using Nix: provided by replit.nix)

config.name: run = "node validate-schema.js" (.replit)
config.purpose: Defines the main run command for Replit and deployment.

config.name: [nix] channel = "stable-23_11"
config.purpose: Specifies Nix channel used for dependency resolution in Replit.

run_dev.step: Run the schema validator script (e.g. validate-schema.js) locally using Node.js.

run_prod.step: Run the validator script as used in deployment or CI (default: node validate-schema.js).

usage_examples.description: Validate the ELI schema and sample output.

verification_steps.step: Run the validator script and check that sample ELI outputs conform to JSON schema.

common_failures.cause: Input files do not conform to ELI JSON schema.
common_failures.fix: Check and correct schema conformance for all inputs.

common_failures.symptom: Cannot find or execute node command.
common_failures.cause: Node.js is not installed or not on PATH.
common_failures.fix: Install Node.js 20 or higher and ensure it is available in your environment.

unknowns.what_is_missing: Install instructions for environments other than Replit/Nix.
unknowns.why_it_matters: Operators on Mac/Windows/Linux may not use Nix or Replit; their setup steps are unclear.
unknowns.what_evidence_needed: Explicit install instructions for Node.js, jq, and dependency management outside of Nix.

unknowns.what_is_missing: Any steps for building, packaging, or deploying production artifacts outside schema validation.
unknowns.why_it_matters: Needed for integrating ELI into CI/CD or downstream systems.
unknowns.what_evidence_needed: Documentation or scripts specifying build or deployment processes.

unknowns.what_is_missing: Detailed examples showing the use of ELI with actual claims/evidence inputs and HALO integration.
unknowns.why_it_matters: Operators may need to understand end-to-end workflow for claims with receipts.
unknowns.what_evidence_needed: Sample commands, files, or outputs illustrating complete ELI ↔ HALO usage.

unknowns.what_is_missing: Location and requirements for validate-schema.js script.
unknowns.why_it_matters: Cannot verify operation unless the script location and expected inputs are clear.
unknowns.what_evidence_needed: File listing or documentation describing validate-schema.js.

missing_evidence_requests: Locations, purpose, and operation of validate-schema.js script.
How to generate/prepare inputs for schema validation.
Example output or logs from validation.
Any integration or deployment steps beyond development validation.
